document.description: Berlitz Where to Go in Hong Kong
document.name: WhereToHongKong

lexUnit.definition: COD: the inner side or surface of a thing

sentence.text: Thousands of people do it every day ; what 's wrong with me that my inside 's screaming that it 's not real ?
I remember picturing the wet grease-proof paper it would be wrapped in and how my mother would cut off its head and scrape out its insides .
Robyn 's insides clenched into a tight ball .
Lorimer poked his head inside and then boldly opened the windows further and stepped over the threshold .
At the door to the marquee they exchanged greetings with scores of other guests , gradually making their way inside .
The trains run on special rubber tyres , which have solid insides to prevent accidents caused by a train getting a fiat tyre .
The inside of the boot is lined with Cambrelle and has a removable high density footbed -- this combination added extra comfort when I was pounding over rough and stony ground .
It was the first time that I had ever seen the inside of a police cell .
There is the metal-ring type muzzle , which is screwed into place via a pin passed across the inside of a ferret 's mouth behind its big teeth and then threaded back into the ring .
His first job was to modify the inside of the house to suit his needs .
Anya sucks at the insides of her own cheeks to suppress a smile .
No you always do your rings from the inside of the actual ring .
This muscle leaves a conspicuous scar on the inside of the shell , an impression which is easily preserved in the fossil state .
The valuations are those of estate agent Peter Freitag but , on this occasion , they were not based on the usual detailed investigation of the inside of the houses .
The mike clipped to the inside of his cuff .
The trick was then to get the newly-formed zygote back into the mother so it could attach to the inside of the womb and develop normally . "
Affixed horizontally to the inside of the treadmill were stout iron bars for the prisoned workers to grasp .
Going up the tower should be from inside .
From inside the vast atrium you can view the whole structure as well as the mechanical workings of the building .
Its futuristic dome design is striking ; inside are interactive exhibits , including one in which you can experience weightlessness .
